resources.string: # Todoist Privacy Policy Last modified: May 17, 2023 Effective date: June 17, 2023

### At Rest - We host all user data on **Amazon Web Services (AWS) servers**. - Our extensive use of AWS\'s built-in firewalls ensures protection against unauthorized remote access. - Projects, tasks, comments, account information, and payment details are **encrypted at rest**. - Files uploaded after **April 11, 2016** are also stored and encrypted. - AWS data centers undergo annual certifications to meet the highest standards of physical and virtual security.

## Reporting Vulnerabilities - If you discover any security vulnerability in Todoist, please submit a report, and we\'ll address it promptly. ## Account Access - We verify account access through both **email/password-based authentication** and **Google Accounts authentication via OAuth 2.0**. - Passwords are stored with unique salts for added protection. - OAuth allows seamless account creation and access without storing Google login credentials. ## Todoist Business Admin Controls - For Todoist Business accounts, we provide two user roles: - **Admin**: Access to the central control panel for managing billing, users, and sharing settings. - **User**: Regular account access.

## GDPR Compliance - Todoist is fully compliant with the **General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)** as of May 25th, 2018. --- For the complete privacy policy, please visit the official Todoist Privacy Policy page. Please note that this is a simplified summary, and I recommend reviewing the full policy for comprehensive details.
